{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3129028,"name":"Eric","username":"Eric2040","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/e/a6a055/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-01-18T18:08:28.351Z","cooked":"

I am using a Mac OS13.1. Loaded the latest of all libraries today
SmartDashboard seems to work fine but Shuffleboard does not see any data from Network tables.
I have set host to localhost and to 127.0.0.1. SmartDashboard likes the 127.0.0.1

Just wondering if anyone else has seen this or if someone has this working so I know it is somewhere in my setup.
